Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Player describes a player in the game Murder Madness. The class manages each Player's turn and the possible actions they can make. Each Player has a number, character they control, and hand of cards. Whether the Player has made a solve attempt is also stored to know if they're eliminated from the game. Player is the parent class of Computer.
Author:
johnh

      public void startTurn​(Game game, InputPanel input)

      Parameters:
      game - the current Game
      input - the InputPanel

    • leaveEstate

      private void leaveEstate​(Game game, InputPanel input, javax.swing.JButton leaveButton, javax.swing.JButton guessButton)
      Lets the Player leave the Estate they're in by choosing an exit to use.
      Parameters:
      game - the current Game
      input - the InputPanel
      leaveButton - the leave action button, removed from InputPanel if leave successful
      guessButton - the guess action button, removed from InputPanel if leave successful

    • moveToEstate

      public static void moveToEstate​(Card c, Estate e)
      Moves a Card to the specified Estate. Used when a guess is made.
      Parameters:
      c - Card to be moved.
      e - Estate the Card is being moved into.

    • refute

      protected boolean refute​(java.util.Set<Card> guess, Player original)
      Returns false if Player has no guess cards in their hand. Else, they must choose one to reveal and it returns true.
      Parameters:
      guess - the Set of Cards in the guess
      original - the Player that made the guess
      Returns:
      true if refute can be made

    • guess

      private void guess​(Game game)
      Lets the Player make a guess by popping up a new GuessOptionPane.
      Parameters:
      game - the current Game

    • solve

      private void solve​(Game game)
      Player attempts to solve the murder. Pops up a new GuessOptionPane. If guess is correct, Player wins! Else Player is eliminated and can no longer guess or make solve attempts.
      Parameters:
      game - the current Game

    • confirmGuess

      public void confirmGuess​(Game game, java.util.Set<Card> guess, boolean guessing)
      Called when a the Cards involved in a guess or solve attempt have been confirmed. If it was a guess, lets Players refute. If it was a solve attempt, eliminates Player if wrong and ends game if right or all eliminated. Ends turn either way.
      Parameters:
      game - the current Game
      guess - the Set of Cards selected for the guess
      guessing - true if a guess, false if a solve attempt

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
